channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 15
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect 15

item.title: CVE-2022-30991|2024-09-17T01:46:35.314Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: HTML injection via report name. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux, Windows) before build 29240

item.title: CVE-2021-44201|2024-09-17T01:36:52.438Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) was possible in notification pop-ups. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows, Linux) before build 28035

item.title: CVE-2022-30990|2024-09-17T03:49:05.176Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to insecure folder permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux) before build 29240, Acronis Agent (Linux) before build 28037

item.title: CVE-2021-44202|2024-09-17T00:35:33.222Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting (XSS) was possible in activity details. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows, Linux) before build 28035

item.title: CVE-2022-30994|2024-09-17T02:06:03.286Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 29240

item.title: CVE-2021-44204|2024-09-17T01:12:21.982Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Local privilege escalation via named pipe due to improper access control checks. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 28035, Acronis Agent (Windows) before build 27147, Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 39612, Acronis True Image 2021 (Windows) before build 39287

item.title: CVE-2022-30993|2024-09-17T04:20:12.370Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux, Windows) before build 29240

item.title: CVE-2022-45449|2024-08-03T14:17:00.910Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to excessive privileges assigned to Acronis Agent. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows, Linux) before build 30984.
